title.rendered: Mark Hyman, MD discusses the FDA Banning of Trans Fats on CBS News

content.rendered: The Food and Drug Administration wants the food industry to get rid of artificial trans fats. Dr. Mark Hyman, medical director of The UltraWellness Center in Lenox, Mass., talks to the “CBS This Morning” co-hosts about the effects of the agency’s decision.
